mainText:
Wow! I am deeply saddened, at this time, to hear of the passing of Mr. 
Steve Jobs. I am a very big supporter and consumer of all things Apple 
and was disappointed when I learned of his resignation. I can only hope 
and pray for the strength of those who are affected by the loss. I will 
feel the void anytime Apple is mentioned or whenever I utilize my many 
Apple devices. He was certainly an innovative, genius, and seemingly 
kind soul. He will surely be missed by myself and others.
author: Ja'Net
